movies.title: Esther
movies.plot: Mordecai, a Hebrew, is the gatekeeper at the palace of a great Babylonian king. A woman brings him an orphaned infant girl named Esther. Mordecai raises her as his own daughter, devoutly praying that God care for her. Years pass, and Esther has grown into a kind and beautiful young woman. King Xerxes has ascended to the Babylonian throne, with the evil Haman as his principal adviser. Xerxes has banished his wife, and sends for all of the young women in the kingdom so that he may choose a new wife. At first Mordecai is reluctant to send Esther to Xerxes. But God has chosen Esther for great things, and Mordecai prepares Esther for her meeting with the King. He warns her never to reveal that she is a Jew. Xerxes finds Esther beautiful, and makes her his queen. Over time, Esther helps King Xerxes to understand that in order to be a great king, he must be kind and generous. But evil is at work in the person of the king's second in command, Haman, who declares that everyone in the kingdom ...

biography.bio: Lisa Hart is an actress, known for Animated Stories from the Bible (1987) and Animated Hero Classics (1991).
biography.name: Lisa Hart

biography.bio: Barry Kraft is an actor, known for Animated Stories from the Bible (1987), Animated Hero Classics (1991) and Breakthrough: A Portrait of Aristides Demetrios (1986).
biography.name: Barry Kraft

biography.bio: Johnathon Toppo is an actor, known for Animated Stories from the Bible (1987), Animated Hero Classics (1991) and Clandestiny (1996).
biography.name: Johnathon Toppo

biography.bio: Ivan Crosland was born on August 29, 1936. He was an actor, known for Animated Stories from the New Testament (1987), The ButterCream Gang (1992) and Brigham City (2001). He died on March 26, 2015 in Provo, Utah, USA.
biography.name: Ivan Crosland

biography.bio: Ursula Meyer is an actress, known for Animated Stories from the Bible (1987).
biography.name: Ursula Meyer

biography.bio: Victoria Lindley is an actress, known for Animated Stories from the Bible (1987).
biography.name: Victoria Lindley

biography.bio: Kim McCallum is an actor, known for Clandestiny (1996), Wine Tasting (2009) and Animated Stories from the Bible (1987).
biography.name: Kim McCallum

biography.bio: Phil Hubbard is an actor, known for Animated Stories from the Bible (1987), The Animated Book of Mormon (1987) and Animated Hero Classics (1991).
biography.name: Phil Hubbard

biography.bio: Jamie Newcomb is an actor, known for Lone Wolf (1988), I Want to Keep My Baby! (1976) and Animated Stories from the Bible (1987).
biography.name: Jamie Newcomb

biography.bio: Edward Reese is an actor, known for Animated Stories from the Bible (1987).
biography.name: Edward Reese

biography.bio: Ray Porter is an actor and casting director, known for Almost Famous (2000), Argo (2012) and The Runaways (2010).
biography.name: Ray Porter

biography.bio: Cindy Basco is an actress, known for Animated Stories from the Bible (1987), The Practice (1997) and Judging Amy (1999).
biography.name: Cindy Basco
